Plot: In this sequel to the best-selling lesbian romance novel, Finding You, Lauren Vincenti travels back to Corsica to recover her health and rebuild her relationship with her mother. But things don’t quite go to plan. Is Lauren able to let go of the past and will she comply with her father’s last wishes for her to take over the family business? Anna Taylor-Cartwright’s career is hitting a new high, and her best friend, Eva, is in love. Get ready to fall in love all over again, with the brilliant conclusion to The Vincenti Series.
